sentences.en: Every year thousands of unwanted animals are abandoned.
sentences.cn: 每年有数以千计的没人要的动物被人遗弃。

sentences.en: Have you any unwanted articles for the jumble sale?
sentences.cn: 你可有用不着的东西拿去当旧杂货拍卖 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had always been an outcast, unwanted and alone.
sentences.cn: 他一直都被视为异类，无人理睬，形单影只。

sentences.en: He keeps dogs to ward off unwanted visitors.
sentences.cn: 他养了狗以防不速之客.

sentences.en: It was obscene to spend millions producing unwanted food.
sentences.cn: 耗资数百万去生产一些不需要的食品，真是令人发指。

sentences.en: Regular exercise helps to combat unwanted stress and is a good way of relaxing or letting off steam.
sentences.cn: 经常运动有助于摆脱多余的压力，也是放松或宣泄情感的好办法。

sentences.en: She exposed her unwanted baby by the roadside.
sentences.cn: 她将不想要的婴儿丢弃在路边.

sentences.en: The only way to escape the unwanted attentions of the local men was not to go out.
sentences.cn: 避免被当地人指指点点的唯一办法就是闭门不出。

sentences.en: The suffering is inadvertent and unwanted.
sentences.cn: 这种受苦并非故意,也无必要.

sentences.en: They leave unwanted objects in drawers, cupboards and attics.
sentences.cn: 他们把暂时不需要的东西放在抽屉里 、 壁橱中和搁楼上.

sentences.en: This notice should keep unwanted visitors out.
sentences.cn: 这条启事能把闲人拒之门外.

sentences.en: Unwanted recordings may simply be erased by demagnetizing.
sentences.cn: 不需要的录音只要退一下磁就可以抹掉.

sentences.en: You can give your unwanted goods to charity.
sentences.cn: 你可以将不要的物品捐赠给慈善机构。

sentences.en: You will have to kill these unwanted plants with poison.
sentences.cn: 你将不得不用药物把这些讨厌的植物毒死.

words.tran_cn: 不需要的；有害的；讨厌的；空闲的

trans.tran_cn: 不需要的，无用的，多余的，讨厌的，有缺点的
